title: Spacious, Renovated 2 Bed/1 Bath with Wrap Around Patio!
map_address: 140 Lower Via Casitas 7 near South Eliseo Drive
posting_body: Newly Renovated Luxury Apartment in Greenbrae just above Bon Air Shopping Plaza!
This 2 Bed/1 Bath apartment has in-unit washer dryer with all the other luxury finishes you can ask for!
Parking is included and comes with a storage unit.
Aqua Terra is a community offering a great residential environment, upscale interiors and excellent service for our residents.
Our designer put careful thought into custom features such as cedar-lined closets with built-in closet organization systems.
The gourmet kitchen boasts a stainless steel appliance package, granite countertops, custom backsplash, and designer cabinetry are the perfect blend of functionality and elegance.
You must see the custom homes to understand the value of exquisite finishes carved out of a traditional floor plan.
*Tours by Appointment Only, Call to Schedule Today!*
Aqua Terra is a pet friendly community!
Pet deposit is $500 and there is $35/month pet rent for cats and $50/month pet rent for dogs.
